title: Fabulosity Is You! A Womanâ€™s Guide For Building Her Confidence, Fashion Tips, Weight Loss Tips, Skin Care Secrets, Relationships and Pursuing Her Purpose
features: Want to know what it means to be fabulous?Are you suffering from low self-esteem?Do you want to change your style?How badly do you want to lose the weight?Do you want to know the secret to having great skin?Do you want to learn how to overcome heartbreak and live a life of love and abundance?Are you ready to live a life of purpose?Give yourself a gift and get this divine book which is the ultimate guide for young women. If you are over thirty, have been divorced and want to re-discover what it means to feel fabulous, then do not hesitate to get a copy of this personal guide. Begin to define and empower yourself. The advice in this book will stay with you for a long time and leave you feeling more EMPOWERED and FABULOUS!
description: Fabulosity Is You! is a book written for women of any age. This is a useful guide for building confidence while pursuing your own purpose in life. You will find helpful tips for fashion, weight loss, and skin care. The author even includes some of her own natural recipes in skin care to bring out the "glow" using facial scrubs and masks. By following the tips in this book any woman can learn how to be "sexy" by enhancing their natural beauty. She also touches on love and heartache, and how to have a happy, fulfilling relationship/marriage, never losing the pursuit of being "you." Winsome Campbell-Green's Chapter Nine says it all: NOTHING IS AS SEXY AS A WOMAN WITH CONFIDENCE! I highly recommend this book to all girls/women of any age!
Winsome Campbell is a Relationship Expert, MotivationalSpeaker and Author.
